span.em: Welcome to the Barrington School District!

br.br: The mission of the Barrington School District is to be an inclusive school community where students are prepared to be intellectually and physically engaged members of the local and global community.

span.em: We foster an environment that encourages and celebrates life-long learning and teaching for students, staff, and community members based on the principle that we all have strengths and experiences to contribute.

div.br:
If you would like to make a public comment during either of the two Public Comment sessions during the School Board meeting, please click on the Public Comment bubble above and fill out the form.
During the meeting the conference line will be muted. During the public comment session the conference line will be unmuted and the board chair will call on each resident to speak.
